title: Lag is terrible
body: Guys, I just started playing and I have 2 fps and sometimes 5 fps. I have looked at videos and changed computer settings, deleted temporary files, changed settings in the game and nothing seems to work. It is just extremely laggy and jerks non-stop. Please help me!

replies.body: Make sure you've got the latest drivers for DirectX and your graphics card would be the first two steps to helping FPS problem. If that's not the solution, make sure you run through the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover all of your basics.
